parameters.queryText:
SELECT r.resourceAppId
  FROM c
  JOIN r IN c.requiredResourceAccess
 WHERE c.type = 'applications'

SELECT c.id,
       c.appId,
       c.displayName,
       c.owners,
       c.passwordCredentials,
       c.api,
       c.appRoles,
       c.requiredResourceAccess,
       c.type
  FROM c
 WHERE EXISTS(SELECT VALUE r FROM r IN c.requiredResourceAccess)
      AND c.type = 'applications'

SELECT VALUE s
  FROM c
  JOIN s IN c.oauth2PermissionScopes
 WHERE c.type = 'appExposedPermissions'
   AND c.appId = '@{body('Parse_JSON_requieredResrouceAccess')?['resourceAppId']}'
   AND s.id = '@{body('Parse_JSON_resourceAccess')?['id']}'

SELECT VALUE a
  FROM c
  JOIN a IN c.appRoles
 WHERE c.type = 'appExposedPermissions'
   AND c.appId = '@{body('Parse_JSON_requieredResrouceAccess')?['resourceAppId']}'
   AND a.id = '@{body('Parse_JSON_resourceAccess')?['id']}'

select c.appDisplayName
  from c 
 where c.appId = '@{body('Parse_JSON_requieredResrouceAccess')?['resourceAppId']}'
   and c.type = 'appExposedPermissions'

SELECT c.appId as ApplicationId,
       c.displayName as ApplicationName,
       r.appDisplayName as ApiPermissionName,
       a["value"] as PermissionName
  FROM c
  JOIN r IN c.requiredResourceAccess
  JOIN a IN r.resourceAccess
 WHERE c.type = "applications"
